import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core';
import { MatBottomSheetRef } from '@angular/material';
import { AuthService } from 'src/app/auth-service/auth.service';


@Component({
  selector: 'app-dialog-modal',
  templateUrl: './dialog-modal.component.html',
  styleUrls: ['./dialog-modal.component.css']
})
export class DialogModalComponent   {
  GroupNames: any;
  returnValue: boolean;
  constructor(private _bottomSheetRef: MatBottomSheetRef<DialogModalComponent>, public authService: AuthService) {}

  openLink(event: MouseEvent): void {
    this._bottomSheetRef.dismiss();
    event.preventDefault();
  }
  isMemberOfGroup(group: string) {
    this.GroupNames= localStorage.getItem('GroupNames');
    if(this.GroupNames !== null) {
    let a = this.GroupNames.toString().indexOf(group);

    if (a !== -1) {
      this.returnValue = true;
    }
  }
    return this.returnValue;
    }
}

<mat-nav-list>
    <a routerLink='/meldingen/defectMelden' mat-list-item (click)="openLink($event)">
        <span mat-line>Create Melding</span>
    </a>
    <a *ngIf="authService.isAdmin  || authService.isOpleidinghhofd" routerLink='/tasks/createTask' mat-list-item (click)="openLink($event)">
        <span mat-line>Create Opdracht</span>
    </a>
</mat-nav-list>
